offences.title: Public service vehicle - passenger use altered / defaced ticket
offences.titleWelsh: Cerbyd gwasanaeth cyhoeddus - defnydd tocyn wedi'i addasu / amharu ar ddefnyddwyr
offences.legislation: Contrary to regulation 7(1)(a) of the Public Service Vehicles (Conduct of Drivers, Inspectors, Conductors and Passengers) Regulations 1990 and section 25 of the Public Passenger Vehicles Act 1981.
offences.legislationWelsh: Yn groes i reoliad 7 (1) (a) o Reoliadau Cerbydau Gwasanaeth Cyhoeddus (Ymddygiad Gyrwyr, Arolygwyr, Ymddygiad a Theithwyr) 1990 ac adran 25 o Ddeddf Cerbydau Teithwyr Cyhoeddus 1981.
offences.wording: On 10/08/2016 At Threadneedle Street EC2 Being a passenger on a Public service Vehicle operated on behalf of London Bus Services Limited being used for the carriage of passengers at separate fares where the vehicle was being operated by a Driver without a Conductor did not as directed by the Driver an Inspector or a Notice displayed on the vehicle pay the fare for the journey in accordance with the direction
